code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 8 months history of moderate abdominal pain. he is a white M upholsterer aged 67 yrs. he denies ever using cigarettes he is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 65 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 97.6 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:patient presents with 7 days history of worsening moderate abdominal pain. patient is a 67 yr old white male. o:Height 65 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered Endoscopic therapy reduction - stomach.

td.content: s:68 yo male upholsterer c/o 7 days h/o moderate abdominal pain. NKDA. Patient does not smoke he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years o:Height 65 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered Reticulocyte Count.
